headline: Greta: Remembering Fred Thompson
subHeadline: Greta's 'Off the Record,' 11/2/15: 'On the Record' pays tribute to actor and former senator Fred Thompson, who died this weekend at age 73 and will be remembered for a long, distinguished, multifaceted career

utterances.speaker: VAN SUSTEREN
utterances.sentences: In 2008, Senator Thompson ran for President himself and he joins us, nice to see you, sir. FRED THOMPSON Good to see you, again.

utterances.speaker: VAN SUSTEREN
utterances.sentences: I take it you don't miss running?

utterances.speaker: THOMPSON
utterances.sentences: I don't. I don't. I have been there, done that. Well, he didn't miss running, but today we all miss him. He was a unique man with a varied and successful career. He always brought his A-game to everything he did, including "On the Record." So I will miss Fred.   That's my "Off the Record" comment tonight.

utterances.speaker: VAN SUSTEREN
utterances.utterance: In 2008, Senator Thompson ran for President himself and he joins us, nice to see you, sir. FRED THOMPSON Good to see you, again.

utterances.speaker: VAN SUSTEREN

He always brought his A-game to everything he did, including "On the Record." So I will miss Fred. That's my "Off the Record" comment tonight.
